attributes.action: Create a tax on second homes to fund the building of affordable homes for local people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In many coastal or rural areas the cost of property within a local community has been pushed above the means of local people due to the purchase of second / holiday homes by people more well off generally from the southeast. This has led to many younger people having to move away as they cannot afford a home where they are brought up. The tax would be 15% of the cost of the property to go towards the building of new homes for local people to keep communities alive.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
